## Classes

Class | Description
--- | :---
sklearn.impute.simpleImputer | simple imputing methods
sklearn.compose.ColumnTransformer | apply transformers to columns of arrays or pandas.DataFrame
sklearn.preprocessing.OneHotEncoder | encode category variables into multiple columns using 0 and 1
sklearn.preprocessing.LabelEncoder  | encode category variables to values between 0 and nclass-1, used for target variables
